articles.content:
Bharat Electronics Ltd. has secured orders worth Rs 847 crore from the Finance Ministry. 
It includes a Rs 665.84-crore order from the Central Board of Indirect Taxes and Customs. The order involves… [+1012 chars]

articles.author: Ajinkya Lad
articles.title: 2024 Bajaj Pulsar N150 spotted at a dealership - BikeWale
articles.description: The updated 2024 Bajaj Pulsar N150 gets a new fully digital instrument cluster, along with new decals to differentiate itself from the current model.
articles.content:
- Gets a fully digital instrument cluster
- Will get Bluetooth connectivity with calls and SMS alerts
- Will feature new decals and graphics
